none: 愛知県唯心寺の算額 (現物)・Sangaku of Yuishinji Temple, Aichi (Original)

大仙寺様には、算額の撮影および掲載の許可を賜り、感謝申し上げます。 表示 - 非営利 4.0 国際： https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc/4.0/deed.ja・We would like to thank Daisen-ji Temple for their kind permission to photograph the sangaku and post it in the archive.  CC BY-NC 4.0: https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc/4.0/
愛知県知多郡美浜町上野間小手廻間・Kotemawari, Uwanoma, Mihama Town, Chita District, Aichi Prefecture

県調査文化財
保管所：愛知県知多郡美浜町上野間高川23　大仙寺・Prefecturally Surveyed Cultural Property  
Storage Location: 23 Takagawa, Uenoma, Mihama Town, Chita District, Aichi Prefecture, Daisenji Temple
